hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira: Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said "The Prophet) Abraham circumcised himself after he had passed the age of eighty years and he circumcised himself with an adze

chapter.ara-name: باب الْخِتَانِ بَعْدَ الْكِبَرِ وَنَتْفِ الإِبْطِ
chapter.eng-name: Circumcision at an old age, and pulling out armpit hair
